recommendations: Dr. Paritosh Basu ‚ÄúI have known Dr. Renjith PR, currently the CHRO of Manappuram Finance Limited, since we first met at a conference in Kochi on digital transformation and blockchain technology. That event marked the beginning of a strong professional connection and friendship built on a shared passion for innovation and technology-driven solutions. Dr. Renjith has impressed me with his innovative mindset, especially in digitalisation and data-driven decision-making. During his tenure as the Chief Learning Officer at Manappuram, he successfully launched a fully digital training ecosystem that spans the entire organization across India. Under his leadership, the company developed an in-house Learning Management System (LMS) tailored to the needs of over 50,000 employees. I had multiple occasions to collaborate with him closely, during which he facilitated the process of exploring opportunities to implement blockchain applications in the gold loan business. His strategic insight and openness to emerging technologies enriched the discussions. As he transitioned into the role of CHRO, Dr. Renjith has continued to lead transformative initiatives in HR digitalisation and automation. His intense focus on AI-driven HR analytics and strategic HR business partnering has positively impacted aligning human capital initiatives with business goals. He is a forward-thinking leader who stays constantly updated on evolving technology trends in the HR field and leverages them to drive meaningful change.‚Äù

Unnikrishnan T P ‚ÄúDr Renjith is a visionary and true example of hard work & passion. He takes pride in upbringing people around by all means. Excellent people skills and continuously upgrades himself with new learnings. He is one of the enabler in Manappuram‚Äôs mission of ‚Äòmaking ordinary people to achieve extra ordinary things‚Äô. I recommend Dr Renjith. ‚Äù

detailed_profile.about: Manappuram Finance Limited benefits from a seasoned leader with expertise in vigilance, fraud detection, and risk management. With over eight months in the role as Head of Vigilance and Fraud, the team focuses on developing robust frameworks to protect organizational integrity and ensure compliance. Banking and credit competencies enable the organization to mitigate risks effectively while fostering a secure financial ecosystem. Prior to this, contributions at Mashreq Global Networks as Senior Manager in Enterprise Risk were pivotal in enhancing fraud detection and investigative protocols. The role emphasized collaboration to strengthen enterprise-wide defenses against financial crime. With a career rooted in vigilance and fraud risk management, the focus remains on empowering organizations to navigate dynamic financial landscapes confidently.

detailed_profile.position: Contact Centre Head at Manappuram Finance Ltd.
detailed_profile.about: As a seasoned professional with more than 20 years of experience in the fields of telecom and finance, I have successfully handled multiple roles including Call Centre Head, Service Centre Manager, Training & Quality, Customer Relationship Manager and Personal Secretary of Executive Director. My expertise lies in delivering exceptional customer service, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maintaining high-quality standards. I have extensive experience in setting up call centers from scratch, including designing workflows, developing training materials, selecting and implementing call center software, hiring and training agents, and managing day-to-day operations. My ability to manage teams, coach employees, and deliver comprehensive training programs has resulted in consistently exceeding customer expectations and achieving business goals. My experience has also honed my skills in conflict resolution, problem-solving, and effective communication, enabling me to build long-lasting relationships with clients and stakeholders. I have gained proficiency in using MS Office tools to enhance productivity and streamline workflows. Additionally, I possess the knowledge of Six Sigma, which enables me to identify and eliminate process inefficiencies, reduce costs, and improve overall customer experience.

detailed_profile.about: A Passion driven Human Resources Professional. With over 10 years of experience in human resources, I am passionate about finding, attracting, and retaining top talent for diverse and dynamic organizations. I have a master's degree in business administration with a specialization in human resources and marketing, and I have earned multiple certifications in strategic communications, leadership, and personality styles. As a senior manager HR at GramPro Business Services, I oversee the end-to-end recruitment process and all the allied activities, including planning, execution, team management, salary negotiation, offer management, campus connections, transition management, employee engagement, experience, and wellness. I leverage my skills in strategic communications, talent management, and leadership to build strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders, foster a positive and inclusive work culture, and support the growth and development of my team and the organization.

detailed_profile.position: National Credit Head- CV @ Manappuram | Credit Portfolio Management
detailed_profile.about: With over 23 years of experience in the loans and finance industry, I have developed and honed my skills in credit management, customer relationship management, delinquency management, and risk management. I have successfully led and managed multiple teams across different regions and products, delivering consistent and profitable results for my organization and clients. Currently, I am the National Credit Head - CV / CE at Manappuram Finance Limited, a leading non-banking financial company in India. In this role, I am responsible for overseeing the entire credit portfolio of the commercial vehicle segment, ensuring compliance with the regulatory and internal policies, managing the credit risk and underwriting quality, and driving the business growth and customer satisfaction. I am also involved in developing and implementing new initiatives, systems, and processes to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the credit operations and decision making. I enjoy working with a diverse and talented team of professionals, and I am always eager to learn and explore new opportunities and challenges in the dynamic and evolving financial sector.

projects.title: A Study on Working Capital Management with special reference to Exide Industries
projects.description: During my MBA program, I conducted a detailed study on Working Capital Management, focusing specifically on Exide Industries. The project aimed to analyze Exide Industries' strategies and practices in managing its current assets and liabilities. Key areas of investigation included cash conversion cycle, inventory management, accounts receivable and payable, and their impact on the company's financial performance and liquidity. Through this study, I gained insights into effective working capital management strategies applicable to industrial contexts.

positions.description_html:
As an Assistant Branch Head in the Gold Loan division, I am responsible for overseeing daily branch operations, ensuring smooth and efficient processing of gold loans, and driving business growth while maintaining the highest standards of customer service and compliance.

My role focuses on supporting the Branch Head in achieving sales targets, managing a motivated team, ensuring secure and transparent gold loan transactions, and fostering long-term relationships with customers. I am committed to delivering customer-centric solutions, streamlining operational efficiency, and ensuring strict adherence to regulatory guidelines.

Key Responsibilities:

Supervising and supporting branch operations

Ensuring smooth gold loan processing and disbursement

Leading and motivating the branch team toward business targets

Building and maintaining strong customer relationships

Ensuring compliance with company policies and RBI guidelines

Handling audits, reports, and risk management
